mapper.insert: INSERT INTO city (city_id, city, country_id, last_update) VALUES (#{id}, #{city}, #{country, typeHandler=CountryIdTypeHandler}, #{lastUpdate})

INSERT INTO address (address_id, address, address2, district, city_id, postal_code, phone, last_update) VALUES (#{id}, #{address}, #{address2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district}, #{city, typeHandler=CityIdTypeHandler}, #{postalCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone}, #{lastUpdate})
